proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is losing 12 hours a week on proposals. Here's how to reclaim them.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, it takes hours to craft each proposal. With our system, generate a complete, branded proposal in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every hour spent manually drafting proposals bleeds valuable time and money.

problems.title: Wasted Design Hours
problems.description: Each proposal requires hours of design tweaks, costing Shida over $15,000 annually. This time could be spent on profitable projects.

problems.title: Lost Client Opportunities
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean missed client deadlines. Each missed deadline risks losing up to $5,000 in potential revenue.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually crafted proposals can lead to branding inconsistencies. This diminishes Shida's professional image, costing reputational damage.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Paying skilled designers to draft proposals is costly. Shida spends around $20,000 a year on this non-billable task.

problems.title: Proposal Fatigue
problems.description: Repeatedly drafting proposals leads to fatigue and errors. This reduces Shida's efficiency and could result in costly mistakes.

problems.title: Delayed Turnarounds
problems.description: Manual proposal creation delays the process by days. These delays cost Shida timely client engagement, risking $8,000 in lost potential business.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these inefficiencies with rapid, precise proposal generation.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system delivers a ready-to-send proposal in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual processes lead to branding inconsistencies. Our system ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with Shida's brand.

solutions.title: Cost Reduction
solutions.description: Drafting proposals manually incurs high labor costs. Our system reduces this expense, allowing Shida to allocate resources to growth activities.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Engagement
solutions.description: Delayed proposals frustrate potential clients. Our system ensures rapid turnarounds, keeping clients engaged and satisfied.

solutions.title: Error-Free Proposals
solutions.description: Manual drafting leads to errors. Our system automates this process, ensuring accuracy and quality in every proposal.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Brand with Shida's Expert Graphic Design
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Our plan will enhance your brand identity and increase market presence through targeted design solutions.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently facing significant revenue loss due to unoptimized branding and design strategies.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Every inconsistent brand element is a missed opportunity to build trust. This inconsistency might cost you up to 15% in customer retention.

problems.title: Low Engagement
problems.description: A lack of engaging visual content can lead to a 20% drop in customer interaction on digital platforms.

problems.title: Outdated Design
problems.description: Using outdated design elements could result in a 25% decrease in new customer acquisitions.

problems.title: Ineffective Marketing Materials
problems.description: Poorly designed marketing materials can reduce campaign effectiveness by 30%, affecting sales growth.

problems.title: Weak Online Presence
problems.description: An underwhelming online presence could lower your conversion rates by 40%, impacting overall sales.

problems.title: Lack of Brand Identity
problems.description: Without a strong brand identity, you risk losing up to 50% of potential market share to competitors.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Shida offers targeted solutions that address each of these critical losses.

solutions.title: Brand Identity Development
solutions.description: Strengthen your brand's visual identity to increase customer trust and retention.

solutions.title: Digital Marketing Design
solutions.description: Create engaging digital content to boost customer interaction and sales.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Update your website design to enhance customer experience and conversion rates.

solutions.title: Marketing Collateral Design
solutions.description: Develop effective marketing materials to maximize campaign success.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: At Shida, we combine creativity with strategy to transform your business.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has years of experience in creating impactful designs that drive business success.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize your needs, ensuring solutions are tailored specifically to your business goals.

whyUsCards.title: Results-Driven
whyUsCards.description: We focus on measurable outcomes to ensure a tangible return on your investment.

whyUsCards.title: Transparent Communication
whyUsCards.description: We maintain open lines of communication to keep you informed at every project stage.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional design solutions.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring that each project aligns with business objectives. His focus on client satisfaction drives our success.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We conduct a thorough analysis of your brand and market position.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Our team crafts tailored design solutions to meet your goals.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We implement design solutions across all necessary platforms.

process.title: Evaluation & Support
process.description: We assess the impact of our solutions and provide ongoing support.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose from our investment options to best fit your needs.

pricing.name: Basic Design Package
pricing.description: Ideal for small businesses looking to enhance basic brand elements.

pricing.name: Comprehensive Design Package
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses aiming for a complete brand overhaul.

pricing.name: Premium Design Package
pricing.description: Perfect for large companies requiring extensive design services.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how Shida can help elevate Acme Corp's brand. No commitment, just a conversation.

lead.company_description: From branding to custom websites and everything in between, Shida Studio is your one-stop shop for all your graphic design needs. Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
